content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite charming. Let's discuss the rental price. What is your budget?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a good question, Mister Schmidt. I am a student, so I am looking for an affordable apartment. How about 500 euros per month?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, 500 euros per month is quite a low offer, especially for a newly built apartment in the city center. I'm sure you understand that I need to cover my costs and make a profit. Would you be willing to increase your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Of course, Mister Schmidt. How about 550 euros per month? I believe this is a fair price for an unfurnished one-bedroom apartment.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, 550 euros per month is still below my expectations. I'm looking for a price that reflects the quality and location of the apartment. Would you be willing to come up to 600 euros per month? This would be a more reasonable starting point for our negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understandable, Mister Schmidt. How about 575 euros per month? I am willing to pay a little more, but I still have to consider my budget as a student.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, 575 euros per month is closer to my expectations, but I'm still not convinced it covers the cost of the apartment. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at 590 euros per month? This would be a fair compromise, I think.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, you are a fair and reasonable person. I accept your offer of 590 euros per month. I agree to the price of 590 euros!
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I'm glad to hear that, Emilia. I agree to the price of 590 euros! The apartment will be available on the first of next month. Is there anything else you would like to discuss?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. That's all for now. I am looking forward to moving into the apartment. If there are no further questions, I believe we can terminate the negotiation.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany
